name: Poser Light Set File
summary: Learn about .LT2 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Poser was originally developed by Smith Micro, but was sold to Bondware in June 2019.

description: Contains lighting information used by Poser, a 3D character modeling and animation program; may include lights, such as spotlights and distant lights; light set files created with Poser 6 and later may also contain point lights and image-based lights.
